title: 2 Easy Ways to Change a PSN Account Age on Desktop or Mobile

steps.title: Contact Sony to update your birthdate.
steps.content: Contact Sony to update your birthdate. If you're unable to change your birthday, Sony may be able to update it for you, as long as you are of age and have a good reason to do so. You can contact Sony via live chat from 8 AM to 7 PM PT daily. Just be sure to provide a reason that doesn't go against Sony's Terms and Conditions; they may ban your account otherwise. To chat with Sony support, PlayStation website . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Log in to your PSN account any time after turning 18.
steps.content: Log in to your PSN account any time after turning 18. If one of your parents created a child account for you, you can switch to an adult account as soon as you turn 18. Just log in to your PlayStation Network account in any web browser, and you'll see instructions on upgrading your account. [2] X Research source You can also upgrade to an adult account on your PS4 or PS5: PS5: Go to Settings > Users and Accounts > Account > Upgrade Your Account and follow the on-screen instructions. PS4: Go to Settings > Account Management and select Account Information . Select Upgrade Your Account , then follow the on-screen instructions.
